name: Super Pingou
description:
Description

A penguin lives alone, reclusive on a planet covered with ice, but a monster arrived from outer space with his army. It's objective is to melt the ice and snow on the planet and thus restore a climate that is adapted for him.

Our hero is going to face this mass invasion, armed with snowballs and a mysterious thermostat...

How to play

You can use the following controls to navigate and interact into the game

Move left, move right and jump

Change temperature

Throw snowballs

Screenshots

Credits

Music by Lucas Henry (music created for the game)

Tiles by pzUH (Itch.io)

Snow layers by PikPng and PNGWave

This game is a french student project created by BEN MOUSSA Mohammed, CAMUS Milan, LEDOUX Nicolas and FILS-AIMÉ Owenn
